snippet: Party leaders are working to mobilize voter turnout in November, but they face changes in their national coalition that could frustrate their efforts.
abstract: Political Memo; Democratic campaign committees for House and Senate are tripling investments in voter mobilization in effort to avoid a midterm election disaster.
lead_paragraph: Party leaders are working to mobilize voter turnout in November, but they face changes in their national coalition that could frustrate their efforts.

headline.main: Democrats Scramble to Stave Off Midterm Disaster
headline.print_headline: Democrats Scramble to Stave Off Midterm Disaster
